text: Ihooya rĩake, na ũrĩa Ngai aahutirio nĩ gũthaithana gwake, o na ningĩ mehia make mothe, na kwaga kwĩhokeka gwake, o na kũndũ kũrĩa gũtũũgĩru kũrĩa aakire mahooero ma Baali, na akĩhaanda itugĩ cia Ashera na mĩhianano mbere ya atanenyiihĩria Jehova-rĩ, mothe nĩmandĩkĩtwo maandĩko-inĩ ma andũ arĩa ooni-maũndũ.
